name: Wachesaw (Full Stack)
postCreateCommand: bash -c 'godot --headless --import 2>/dev/null || true; mkdir -p apps; if command -v gh &>/dev/null && gh auth status &>/dev/null; then [ -d apps/wachesaw-api ] || gh repo clone doughatcher/wachesaw-api apps/wachesaw-api 2>/dev/null || true; [ -d apps/wachesaw-express ] || gh repo clone doughatcher/wachesaw-express apps/wachesaw-express 2>/dev/null || true; fi; cd apps/wachesaw-api 2>/dev/null && npm install 2>/dev/null || true; cd ../wachesaw-express 2>/dev/null && npm install 2>/dev/null || true'
postAttachCommand: echo 'âœ“ Wachesaw full-stack environment ready. Run: just --list'
